3524.verse: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم|And surely, We will let them taste|245|265|13900$مِّنَ|of|50|89|156$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|161|482$ٱلْأَدْنَىٰ|the nearer|89|128|6970$دُونَ|before|62|82|4462$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|158|482$ٱلْأَكْبَرِ|the greater,|100|171|13901$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|206|1621$يَرْجِعُونَ|return.|105|140|3002$

3525.verse: وَمَنْ|And who|77|86|1012$أَظْلَمُ|(is) more unjust|125|142|1060$مِمَّن|than (he) who|115|132|1061$ذُكِّرَ|is reminded|94|111|10859$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|of (the) Verses|121|138|609$رَبِّهِۦ|(of) his Lord,|106|115|392$ثُمَّ|then|50|70|293$أَعْرَضَ|he turns away|115|155|10511$عَنْهَآ‌ۚ|from them?|94|134|380$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|136|120$مِنَ|from|50|90|156$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|the criminals,|118|138|5641$مُنتَقِمُونَ|(will) take retribution.|164|164|13902$

3526.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|119|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|102|509$مُوسَى|Musa|83|107|499$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Scripture,|112|136|451$فَلَا|so (do) not|95|119|208$تَكُن|be|58|82|2943$فِى|in|48|60|89$مِرْيَةٍ|doubt|69|76|8419$مِّن|about|58|72|53$لِّقَآئِهِۦ‌ۖ|receiving it.|98|112|13903$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ|And We made it|125|139|10213$هُدًى|a guide|68|82|33$لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|for the Children of Israel.|186|193|3092$

3527.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We made|111|130|4805$مِنْهُمْ|from them|87|126|730$أَئِمَّةً|leaders|67|106|11856$يَهْدُونَ|guiding|80|119|6928$بِأَمْرِنَا|by Our Command|132|171|11857$لَمَّا|when|55|74|3471$صَبَرُواْ‌ۖ|they were patient|139|176|6772$وَكَانُواْ|and they were|116|189|615$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|of Our Verses|110|183|408$يُوقِنُونَ|certain.|90|127|50$

3529.verse: أَوَلَمْ|Does it not|93|103|2346$يَهْدِ|guide|55|74|6638$لَهُمْ|[for] them,|93|112|98$كَمْ|(that) how many|132|151|1840$أَهْلَكْنَا|We have destroyed|149|168|5422$مِن قَبْلِهِم|before them|107|117|1094$مِّنَ|of|50|61|156$ٱلْقُرُونِ|the generations,|129|151|8775$يَمْشُونَ|they walk about|127|149|7089$فِى|in|48|70|89$مَسَـٰكِنِهِمْ‌ۚ|their dwellings.|119|141|11686$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|92|58$فِى|in|48|59|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|110|28$لَأَيَـٰتٍ‌ۖ|surely, are Signs.|135|226|1434$أَفَلَا|Then do not|101|192|452$يَسْمَعُونَ|they hear?|102|148|731$

3532.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|60|765$يَوْمَ|`(On the) Day|115|135|1057$ٱلْفَتْحِ|(of) the Decision,|136|156|13909$لَا|not|42|62|30$يَنفَعُ|will benefit|91|111|1422$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|109|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieve|84|94|59$إِيمَـٰنُهُمْ|their belief|90|137|13910$وَلَا|and not|71|166|25$هُمْ|they|50|145|49$يُنظَرُونَ|will be granted respite.`|180|227|1411$

3533.verse: فَأَعْرِضْ|So turn away|109|130|4130$عَنْهُمْ|from them|87|129|2643$وَٱنتَظِرْ|and wait.|92|134|13911$إِنَّهُم|Indeed, they|105|147|106$مُّنتَظِرُونَ|(are) waiting.|115|136|6207$

3524.verse: And we will surely let them taste the nearer punishment short of the greater punishment that perhaps they will repent.

3525.verse: And who is more unjust than one who is reminded of the verses of his Lord; then he turns away from them? Indeed We, from the criminals, will take retribution.

3526.verse: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.

3527.verse: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.

3528.verse: Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

3529.verse: Has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them, [as] they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs; then do they not hear?

3530.verse: Have they not seen that We drive the water [in clouds] to barren land and bring forth thereby crops from which their livestock eat and [they] themselves? Then do they not see?

3531.verse: And they say, "When will be this conquest, if you should be truthful?"

3532.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "On the Day of Conquest the belief of those who had disbelieved will not benefit them, nor will they be reprieved."

3533.verse: So turn away from them and wait. Indeed, they are waiting.
